content: PSCU Pipe saddle with U-Bolt Connectors and coated U-Bolts for attaching single pipe runs on vertical MT box profiles ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Pipe supports- ### FEATURES:Features Provides an easy-to-install, adjustable and flexible solution which eliminates the need for welding Height can be adjusted easily Designed for fast, one-person installation Noise and corrosion reduction due to insulation Applications For use with MT girders to fix and support pipes Supporting pipes for industrial, energy, civil and heavy commercial applications Insulated connections between saddle/U-bolt and pipe ### TECHNICAL DATA: Environmental conditions: Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) Technical Data | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2199851 - Pipe saddle w/coated U-bolt PSCU 2 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x with rubber 2 Pipe ring saddle -
